description: Detects a certain command line flag combination used by regsvr32 when used to download and register a DLL from a remote address which uses HTTP (not HTTPS) and a IP address and not FQDN
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: FQDNs that start with a number
name: Suspicious Regsvr32 HTTP IP Pattern
query: (process.command_line.text:*\ \/s* AND process.command_line.text:*\ \/u* AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \/i\:http\:\/\/1* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/2* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/3* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/4* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/5* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/6* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/7* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/8* OR *\ \/i\:http\:\/\/9* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/1* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/2* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/3* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/4* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/5* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/6* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/7* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/8* OR *\ \/i\:https\:\/\/9*))
